original_title: 神の子～シンジとリンカ～
overview: Shinji and his daughter Shizuku are attacked. The crazy yakuza Jizo takes Shizuku hostage and forces her father to demand 100 million yen back from the thief Rinka. Desperate, Shinji sets off, but he is not the only one hot on Rinka's heels.
title: Children of God - Shinji and Rinka -
